name: Weekly Game Jam Week 118 - Spaceship
description:
[EXPECT BUGS, THIS GAME WAS MADE WITHIN A SHORT SPACE OF TIME]

Delve into this simplistic, 8-bit spaceship game; Fight hordes of enemy ships and upgrade your ship until you're an unstoppable force.

The game, simply titled "Spaceship" pits you against enemies in the depths of space.

How far will you get?

GAMEPLAY VIDEO:

CONTROLS:
A/Left Arrow - Move Left
D/Right Arrow - Move Right
Space - Shoot
Escape - Close

[CONTROLLER ALSO SUPPORTED]

Music by: patrickdearteaga.com
